page.title: 08Brecon County Library contd.
page.content: The librarian/driver can help find books,and also takes requests. Approx. 7000 books are requested on average per year. The county librarian is accountable to the library museums committee. All exhibitions, functions, increases in fines, and holiday closing dates are displayed in the library or in the local press. The number of borrowers registered is 16,500 adults and 5,400 children. The area librarian is Mr.Jones. Mr Price is in charge of the libraries book intake etc. Mr Cartwright is the librarian assistant and Mr Thomas is the schools librarian. The library assistants are Mrs Williams, Mrs Harris, Miss Morgan and Miss Goreham. Miss Price is the secretary.
